actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize the uniformed services to furnish dental prostheses to dependents of members of the uniformed services in facilities of the uniformed services without reimbursement.

summary.text: Authorizes the furnishing of dental prostheses at no charge to military dependents in facilities of the uniformed services.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize the uniformed services to furnish dental prostheses to dependents of members of the uniformed services in facilities of the uniformed services without reimbursement.
